name: Dungeon Clicker!
description:
Dungeon Clicker:

Dungeon Clicker is an usual Clicker Game, BUT with a twist... its in an Dungeon! U have to kill monsters to get money to then buy upgrades! So your character gets stronger and stronger!

we are currently working on version 5 off this Game!

UPDATES for version 5:

  • Double Money upgrade working
  • Sword Upgrade working on
  • coin animation working
  • currently working on Sound effects
  • New Background

How to play:

  1. click Download...
  2. open the zip/rar folder
  3. open the folder "Dungeon Clicker"
  4. search for the .exe 
  5. open it up
  6. enjoy!

WARNING:

IT IS JUST A DEMO!!!

currently only playable on Windows! Mac and Linux version coming soon!

try it out now!
